   20: -module(ms_transform_SUITE).
   21: -author('pan@erix.ericsson.se').
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   27: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   29: -export([basic_ets/1]).
   30: -export([basic_dbg/1]).
   31: -export([from_shell/1]).
   32: -export([records/1]).
   33: -export([record_index/1]).
   34: -export([map_pattern/1]).
   35: -export([map_expr_in_head/1]).
   36: -export([map_pattern_from_shell/1]).
   37: -export([map_expr_in_head_from_shell/1]).
   38: -export([map_exprs/1]).
   39: -export([map_exprs_from_shell/1]).
   40: -export([top_match/1]).
   41: -export([multipass/1]).
   42: -export([old_guards/1]).
   43: -export([autoimported/1]).
   44: -export([semicolon/1]).
   45: -export([bitsyntax/1]).
   46: -export([binary_bifs/1]).
   47: -export([record_defaults/1]).
   48: -export([andalso_orelse/1]).
   49: -export([float_1_function/1]).
   50: -export([action_function/1]).
   51: -export([warnings/1]).
   52: -export([no_warnings/1]).
   53: -export([eep37/1]).
   54: -export([otp_14454/1]).
   55: -export([otp_16824/1]).
   56: -export([unused_record/1]).
   57: -export([optimise_equality_guards_ets_compilation/1]).
   58: -export([optimise_equality_guards_ets_execution/1]).
   59: -export([optimise_equality_guards_ets_equivalence/1]).
   60: -export([ms_transform_optimisations_can_be_disabled_but_default_to_on/1]).
   61: 
   62: 
   63: init_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   67:     ok.
   68: 
   69: suite() ->
   70:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   71:      {timetrap,{minutes,6}}].
   72: 
   73: all() ->
   74:     [from_shell, basic_ets, basic_dbg, records,
   75:      record_index, multipass, bitsyntax, binary_bifs, record_defaults,
   76:      andalso_orelse, float_1_function, action_function,
   77:      warnings, no_warnings, top_match, old_guards, autoimported,
   78:      semicolon, eep37, otp_14454, otp_16824, unused_record,
   79:      map_pattern, map_expr_in_head,
   80:      map_pattern_from_shell, map_expr_in_head_from_shell,
   81:      map_exprs, map_exprs_from_shell,
   82:      optimise_equality_guards_ets_compilation,
   83:      optimise_equality_guards_ets_execution,
   84:      optimise_equality_guards_ets_equivalence,
   85:      ms_transform_optimisations_can_be_disabled_but_default_to_on].
   86: 
   87: groups() ->
   88:     [].
   89: 
   90: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   91:     Config.
   92: 
   93: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   94:     ok.
   95: 
   96: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   97:     Config.
   98: 
   99: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  100:     Config.
  101: 
  102: 
  103: %% This may be subject to change
  104: -define(WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,50).
  105: 
  106: %% Check that shadowed variables in fun head generate warning.
  107: warnings(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  108:     setup(Config),
  109:     Prog = <<"A=5, "
  110: 	     "ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) "
  111: 	     "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  112: 	     "              A andalso B "
  113: 	     "            end)">>,
  114:     [{_,[{{1,22},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}}]}] =
  115: 	compile_ww(Prog),
  116:     [{_,[{1,ms_transform,{50,'A'}}]}] =
  117:         compile_ww(<<>>,Prog,[{error_location,line}]),
  118:     Prog2 = <<"C = 5,
  119:                ets:fun2ms(fun ({A,B} =
  120: 				   C) when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) ->
  121:                                   {A andalso B,C}
  122:                           end)">>,
  123:     [{_,[{{3,8},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}}]}] =
  124: 	      compile_ww(Prog2),
  125: 	      Rec3 = <<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  126: 	      Prog3 = <<"A = 3,
  127:                C = 5,
  128: 			ets:fun2ms(fun (C
  129: 					= #a{a = A, b = B})
  130: 					 when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) ->
  131: 					   {A andalso B,C}
  132: 				   end)">>,
  133:     [{_,[{{3,20},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}},
  134:          {{4,15},ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}}]}] =
  135: 			compile_ww(Rec3,Prog3),
  136: 			Rec4 = <<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  137: 			Prog4 = <<"A=3,C=5, "
  138: 				  "F = fun(B) -> B*3 end,"
  139: 				  "erlang:display(F(A)),"
  140: 				  "ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a = A, b = B} = C) "
  141: 				  "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  142: 				  "              {A andalso B,C} "
  143: 				  "            end)">>,
  144: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}},
  145: 			     {_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}}]}] =
  146: 			compile_ww(Rec4,Prog4),
  147: 			Rec5 = <<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  148: 			Prog5 = <<"A=3,C=5, "
  149: 				  "F = fun(B) -> B*3 end,"
  150: 				  "erlang:display(F(A)),"
  151: 				  "B = ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a = A, b = B} = C) "
  152: 				  "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  153: 				  "              {A andalso B,C} "
  154: 				  "            end)">>,
  155: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'A'}},
  156: 			     {_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'C'}}]}] =
  157: 			compile_ww(Rec5,Prog5),
  158: 			Prog6 = <<"   X=bar, "
  159: 				  "    A = case X of"
  160: 				  "       foo ->"
  161: 				  "          foo;"
  162: 				  "       Y ->"
  163: 				  "          ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->" % This is a warning
  164: 				  "                         3*Y"
  165: 				  "                     end)"
  166: 				  "   end,"
  167: 				  "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->" % Y out of "scope" here, so no warning
  168: 				  "                  {3*Y,A}"
  169: 				  "              end)">>,
  170: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'Y'}}]}] =
  171: 			compile_ww(Prog6),
  172: 			Prog7 = <<"   X=bar, "
  173: 				  "    A = case X of"
  174: 				  "       foo ->"
  175: 				  "          Y = foo;"
  176: 				  "       Y ->"
  177: 				  "          bar"
  178: 				  "   end,"
  179: 				  "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->" % Y exported from case and safe, so warn
  180: 				  "                  {3*Y,A}"
  181: 				  "              end)">>,
  182: 			[{_,[{_,ms_transform,{?WARN_NUMBER_SHADOW,'Y'}}]}] =
  183: 			compile_ww(Prog7),
  184: 			ok.
  185: 
  186: %% Check that variables bound in other function clauses don't generate
  187: %% warning.
  188: no_warnings(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  189:     setup(Config),
  190:     Prog = <<"tmp(X) when X > 100 ->\n",
  191: 	     "   Y=X,\n"
  192: 	     "   Y;\n"
  193: 	     "tmp(X) ->\n"
  194: 	     "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->\n"
  195: 	     "                  {X, 3*Y}\n"
  196: 	     "              end)">>,
  197:     [] = compile_no_ww(Prog),
  198: 
  199:     Prog2 = <<"tmp(X) when X > 100 ->\n",
  200: 	      "   Y=X,\n"
  201: 	      "   Y;\n"
  202: 	      "tmp(X) when X < 200 ->\n"
  203: 	      "   ok;\n"
  204: 	      "tmp(X) ->\n"
  205: 	      "   ets:fun2ms(fun(Y) ->\n"
  206: 	      "                  {X, 3*Y}\n"
  207: 	      "              end)">>,
  208:     [] = compile_no_ww(Prog2),
  209:     ok.
  210: 
  211: %% Test that andalso and orelse are allowed in guards.
  212: andalso_orelse(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  213:     setup(Config),
  214:     ?assertEqual([{{'$1','$2'},
  215:       [{'and',{is_integer,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  216:       [{'andalso','$1','$2'}]}],
  217: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) "
  218: 			  "            when is_integer(A) and (A+5 > B) -> "
  219: 			  "              A andalso B "
  220: 			  "            end)">>)),
  221:     ?assertEqual([{{'$1','$2'},
  222:       [{'orelse',{is_atom,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  223:       [{'orelse','$1','$2'}]}],
  224: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) "
  225: 			  "            when is_atom(A) or (A+5 > B) -> "
  226: 			  "              A orelse B "
  227: 			  "            end)">>)),
  228:     ?assertEqual([{{'$1','$2'},
  229:       [{'andalso', {is_integer,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  230:       ['$1']}],
  231:         compile_and_run(
  232: 	  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) when is_integer(A) andalso (A+5 > B) ->"
  233: 	    "			 A "
  234: 	    "		 end)">>)),
  235:     ?assertEqual([{{'$1','$2'},
  236:       [{'orelse',{is_atom,'$1'},{'>',{'+','$1',5},'$2'}}],
  237:       ['$1']}],
  238:         compile_and_run(
  239: 	  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) when is_atom(A) orelse (A+5 > B) -> "
  240: 	    "			 A "
  241: 	    "		 end)">>)),
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: 
  245: %% Test that bitsyntax works and does not work where appropriate.
  246: bitsyntax(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  247:     setup(Config),
  248:     [{'_',[],
  249:       [<<0,27,0,27>>]}] =
  250: 	compile_and_run(<<"A = 27, "
  251: 			  "ets:fun2ms(fun(_) -> <<A:16,27:16>> end)">>),
  252:     [{{<<15,47>>,<<0,27>>,<<27,28,19>>},
  253:       [],
  254:       [<<188,0,13>>]}] =
  255: 	compile_and_run(<<"A = 27, "
  256: 			  "ets:fun2ms("
  257:                           "  fun({<<15,47>>,B,C}) "
  258: 			  "  when B =:= <<A:16>>, C =:= <<27,28,19>> -> "
  259: 			  "    <<A:4,12:4,13:16>> "
  260: 			  "  end)">>),
  261:     expect_failure(
  262:       <<>>,
  263:       <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({<<15,47>>,B,C}) "
  264: 	"            when B =:= <<16>>, C =:= <<27,28,19>> -> "
  265: 	"              <<B:4,12:4,13:16>> "
  266: 	"            end)">>),
  267:     expect_failure(
  268:       <<>>,
  269:       <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({<<A:15,47>>,B,C}) "
  270: 	"            when B =:= <<16>>, C =:= <<27,28,19>> -> "
  271: 	"              <<B:4,12:4,13:16>> "
  272: 	"            end)">>),
  273:     ok.
  274: 
  275: 
  276: %% Test that binary BIFs byte_size/1, binary_part/2, binary_part/3 are accepted
  277: binary_bifs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  278:     setup(Config),
  279:     TestSet = [{<<"hello">>, <<"world">>}, {<<"souldn't">>, <<"match">>}],
  280:     RunMS = fun(MS) -> ets:match_spec_run(TestSet, ets:match_spec_compile(MS)) end,
  281:     % check byte_size/1
  282:     MS1 = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A, B}) when byte_size(A) == 5 -> {A, byte_size(B)} end)">>),
  283:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  284:       [{'==',{byte_size,'$1'},5}],
  285:       [{{'$1',{byte_size,'$2'}}}]}] = MS1,
  286:     [{<<"hello">>, 5}] = RunMS(MS1),
  287:     % check binary_part/2
  288:     MS2 = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A, B}) when binary_part(A, {1, 2}) == <<\"el\">> -> binary_part(B, {2, 3}) end)">>),
  289:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  290:       [{'==',{binary_part,'$1',{{1,2}}},<<"el">>}],
  291:       [{binary_part,'$2',{{2,3}}}]}] = MS2,
  292:     [<<"rld">>] = RunMS(MS2),
  293:     % check binary_part/3
  294:     MS3 = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A, B}) when binary_part(A, 1, 2) == <<\"el\">> -> binary_part(B, 2, 3) end)">>),
  295:     [{{'$1','$2'},
  296:       [{'==',{binary_part,'$1',1,2},<<"el">>}],
  297:       [{binary_part,'$2',2,3}]}] = MS3,
  298:     [<<"rld">>] = RunMS(MS3),
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: %% Test that record defaults works.
  302: record_defaults(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  303:     setup(Config),
  304:     [{{<<27>>,{a,5,'$1',hej,hej}},
  305:       [],
  306:       [{{a,hej,{'*','$1',2},flurp,flurp}}]}] =
  307: 	compile_and_run(<<"-record(a,{a,b,c,d=foppa}).">>,
  308: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({<<27>>,#a{a=5, b=B,_=hej}}) -> "
  309: 			  "#a{a=hej,b=B*2,_=flurp} "
  310: 			  "end)">>),
  311:     ok.
  312: 
  313: %% Test basic ets:fun2ms.
  314: basic_ets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  315:     setup(Config),
  316:     ?assertEqual([{{a,b},[],[true]}], compile_and_run(
  317: 			    <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({a,b}) -> true end)">>)),
  318:     ?assertEqual([{{'$1',foo},[{is_list,'$1'}],[{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  319:      {{'$1','$1'},[{is_tuple,'$1'}],[{{{element,1,'$1'},'$*'}}]}],
  320: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,foo}) when is_list(X) -> ",
  321: 			  "{hd(X),object()};",
  322: 			  "({X,X}) when is_tuple(X) ->",
  323: 			  "{element(1,X),bindings()}",
  324: 			  "end)">>)),
  325:     ?assertEqual([{{'$1','$2'},[],[{{'$2','$1'}}]}],
  326: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) -> {B,A} end)">>)),
  327:     ?assertEqual([{{'$1','$2'},[],[['$2','$1']]}],
  328: 	compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) -> [B,A] end)">>)),
  329:     ?assertEqual([{{"foo" ++ '_','$1'},[],['$1']}],
  330:         compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({\"foo\" ++ _, X}) -> X end)">>)),
  331:     ok.
  332: 
  333: %% Tests basic dbg:fun2ms.
  334: basic_dbg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  335:     setup(Config),
  336:     [{[a,b],[],[{message,banan},{return_trace}]}] =
  337: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,b]) -> message(banan), ",
  338: 			  "return_trace() end)">>),
  339:     [{['$1','$2'],[],[{{'$2','$1'}}]}] =
  340: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> {B,A} end)">>),
  341:     [{['$1','$2'],[],[['$2','$1']]}] =
  342: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> [B,A] end)">>),
  343:     [{['$1','$2'],[],['$*']}] =
  344: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> bindings() end)">>),
  345:     [{['$1','$2'],[],['$_']}] =
  346: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([A,B]) -> object() end)">>),
  347:     [{[],[],[{return_trace}]}] =
  348: 	compile_and_run(<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([]) -> return_trace() end)">>),
  349:     ok.
  350: 
  351: %% Test calling of ets/dbg:fun2ms from the shell.
  352: from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  353:     setup(Config),
  354:     Fun = do_eval("fun({a,b}) -> true end"),
  355:     [{{a,b},[],[true]}] = apply(ets,fun2ms,[Fun]),
  356:     [{{a,b},[],[true]}] = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({a,b}) -> true end)"),
  357:     Fun2 = do_eval("fun([a,b]) -> message(banan), return_trace() end"),
  358:     [{[a,b],[],[{message,banan},{return_trace}]}]
  359: 	= apply(dbg,fun2ms,[Fun2]),
  360:     [{[a,b],[],[{message,banan},{return_trace}]}] =
  361: 	do_eval(
  362: 	  "dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,b]) -> message(banan), return_trace() end)"),
  363:     [{{"foo" ++ '_','$1'},[],['$1']}] =
  364:         do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({\"foo\" ++ _, X}) -> X end)"),
  365:     ok.
  366: 
  367: %% Tests expansion of records in fun2ms.
  368: records(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  369:     setup(Config),
  370:     RD = <<"-record(t, {"
  371: 	   "t1 = [] :: list(),"
  372: 	   "t2 = foo :: atom(),"
  373: 	   "t3,"
  374: 	   "t4"
  375: 	   "}).">>,
  376:     ?assertEqual([{{t,'$1','$2',foo,'_'},[{is_list,'$1'}],[{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  377:      {{t,'_','_','_','_'},[{'==',{element,2,'$_'},nisse}],[{{'$*'}}]}],
  378: 	compile_and_run(RD,<<
  379: 			     "ets:fun2ms(fun(#t{t1 = X, t2 = Y, t3 = foo}) when is_list(X) ->
  380:  		       {hd(X),object()};
  381: 			     (#t{}) when (object())#t.t1 == nisse ->
  382: 				   {bindings()}
  383: 			   end)">>)),
  384:     ?assertEqual([{{t,'$1','$2','_',foo},
  385:       [{'==',{element,4,'$_'},7},{is_list,'$1'}],
  386:       [{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  387:      {'$1',[{is_record,'$1',t,5}],
  388:       [{{{element,2,'$1'},
  389: 	 {{t,'$1',foo,undefined,undefined}},
  390: 	 {{t,{element,2,'$1'},{element,3,'$1'},{element,4,'$1'},boooo}}}}]}],
  391: 	compile_and_run(RD,<<
  392:     "ets:fun2ms(fun(#t{t1 = X, t2 = Y, t4 = foo}) when
  393: 			 (object())#t.t3==7,is_list(X) ->
  394:  		       {hd(X),object()};
  395:  		  (A) when is_record(A,t) ->
  396:  		       {A#t.t1
  397: 			,#t{t1=A}
  398: 			,A#t{t4=boooo}
  399: 		       }
  400:  	       end)"
  401: 			>>)),
  402:     [{[{t,'$1','$2',foo,'_'}],[{is_list,'$1'}],[{{{hd,'$1'},'$_'}}]},
  403:      {[{t,'_','_','_','_'}],[{'==',{element,2,{hd,'$_'}},nisse}],[{{'$*'}}]}]=
  404: 	compile_and_run(RD,<<
  405:     "dbg:fun2ms(fun([#t{t1 = X, t2 = Y, t3 = foo}]) when is_list(X) ->
  406:  		       {hd(X),object()};
  407:  		  ([#t{}]) when (hd(object()))#t.t1 == nisse ->
  408:  		       {bindings()}
  409:  	       end)"
  410: 			>>),
  411:     ok.
  412: 
  413: 
  414: %% Test expansion of records in fun2ms, part 2.
  415: record_index(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  416:     setup(Config),
  417:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  418:     [{{2},[],[true]}] = compile_and_run(RD,
  419: 			  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({#a.a}) -> true end)">>),
  420:     [{{2},[],[2]}] = compile_and_run(RD,
  421: 			  <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({#a.a}) -> #a.a end)">>),
  422:     [{{2,'$1'},[{'>','$1',2}],[2]}] = compile_and_run(RD,
  423: 		    <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({#a.a,A}) when A > #a.a -> #a.a end)">>),
  424:     ok.
  425: 
  426: map_pattern(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  427:     setup(Config),
  428:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  429:     MS = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo := V}}) -> V end)">>),
  430:     ok.
  431: 
  432: map_expr_in_head(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  433:     setup(Config),
  434:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  435:     %% Accidentally it is possible to use => instead of := in the fun head,
  436:     %% in compiled code.
  437:     %% Although this is not an intended behaviour it is kept to
  438:     %% maintain backwards compatibility.
  439:     MS = compile_and_run(<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo => V}}) -> V end)">>),
  440:     ok.
  441: 
  442: map_pattern_from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  443:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  444:     MS = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo := V}}) -> V end)"),
  445:     ok.
  446: 
  447: map_expr_in_head_from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  448:     setup(Config),
  449:     MS = [{{key, #{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
  450:     %% Accidentally it is possible to use => instead of := in the fun head,
  451:     %% in compiled code. This behaviour is kept for backwards compatibility.
  452: 
  453:     %% As a side-effect, it is also possible to do the same with
  454:     %% `transform_from_shell/3', if the AST of the shell fun is
  455:     %% created bypassing the linter. (The linter would prevent
  456:     %% constructing such invalid syntax, so normally this is not
  457:     %% possible in the Erlang shell)
  458:     MS = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, #{foo => V}}) -> V end)"),
  459:     ok.
  460: 
  461: map_exprs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  462:     setup(Config),
  463:     MSGuard = [{{key,#{foo => '$2'},'$2'}, [], [#{foo => '$2'}]}],
  464:     MSGuard = compile_and_run(
  465:                 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V1, V2}) when V1 =:= #{foo => V2} -> V1 end)">>),
  466:     MSBody = [{{key,'$1'}, [], [#{foo => '$1'}]}],
  467:     MSBody = compile_and_run(
  468:                 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V}) -> #{foo => V} end)">>),
  469:     ok.
  470: 
  471: map_exprs_from_shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  472:     setup(Config),
  473:     MSGuard = [{{key,#{foo => '$2'},'$2'}, [], [#{foo => '$2'}]}],
  474:     MSGuard = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V1, V2}) when V1 =:= #{foo => V2} -> V1 end)"),
  475:     MSBody = [{{key,'$1'}, [], [#{foo => '$1'}]}],
  476:     MSBody = do_eval("ets:fun2ms(fun({key, V}) -> #{foo => V} end)"),
  477:     ok.
  478: 
  479: %% Tests matching on top level in head to give alias for object().
  480: top_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  481:     setup(Config),
  482:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  483:     [{{a,3,'_'},[],['$_']}] =
  484: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  485: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A = #a{a=3}) -> A end)">>),
  486:     [{{a,3,'_'},[],['$_']}] =
  487: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  488: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a=3} = A) -> A end)">>),
  489:     [{[a,b],[],['$_']}] =
  490: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  491: 			<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun(A = [a,b]) -> A end)">>),
  492:     [{[a,b],[],['$_']}] =
  493: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  494: 			<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,b] = A) -> A end)">>),
  495:     expect_failure(RD,
  496: 			 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({a,A = {_,b}}) -> A end)">>),
  497:     expect_failure(RD,
  498: 			 <<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([a,A = {_,b}]) -> A end)">>),
  499:     expect_failure(RD,
  500: 			 <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A#a{a = 2}) -> A end)">>),
  501:     ok.
  502: 
  503: %% Tests that multi-defined fields in records give errors.
  504: multipass(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  505:     setup(Config),
  506:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  507:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> #a{a=2,a=3} end)">>),
  508:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> A#a{a=2,a=3} end)">>),
  509:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) when A =:= #a{a=2,a=3} ->",
  510: 			 " true end)">>),
  511:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B}) when A =:= B#a{a=2,a=3}->",
  512: 			 "true end)">>),
  513:     expect_failure(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a=3,a=3}) -> true end)">>),
  514:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> #a{a=2,b=3} end)">>),
  515:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) -> A#a{a=2,b=3} end)">>),
  516:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(A) when A =:= #a{a=2,b=3} ->",
  517: 			 " true end)">>),
  518:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun({A,B})when A=:= B#a{a=2,b=3}->",
  519: 			 "true end)">>),
  520:     compile_and_run(RD,<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#a{a=3,b=3}) -> true end)">>),
  521:     ok.
  522: 
  523: 
  524: %% Test that old type tests in guards are translated.
  525: old_guards(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  526:     setup(Config),
  527:     Tests = [
  528: 	     {atom,is_atom},
  529: 	     {float,is_float},
  530: 	     {integer,is_integer},
  531: 	     {list,is_list},
  532: 	     {number,is_number},
  533: 	     {pid,is_pid},
  534: 	     {port,is_port},
  535: 	     {reference,is_reference},
  536: 	     {tuple,is_tuple},
  537: 	     {binary,is_binary},
  538: 	     {function,is_function}],
  539:     lists:foreach(
  540: 	    fun({Old,New}) ->
  541: 		    Bin = list_to_binary([<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  542: 					  atom_to_list(Old),
  543: 					  <<"(X)  -> true end)">>]),
  544: 		    case compile_and_run(Bin) of
  545: 			[{'$1',[{New,'$1'}],[true]}] ->
  546: 			    ok;
  547: 			_ ->
  548: 			    exit({bad_result_for, binary_to_list(Bin)})
  549: 		    end
  550: 	    end,
  551: 	    Tests),
  552:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  553:     [{'$1',[{is_record,'$1',a,3}],[true]}] =
  554: 	compile_and_run(RD,
  555: 			<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when record(X,a) -> true end)">>),
  556:     expect_failure
  557: 	    (RD,
  558: 	     <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when integer(X) and constant(X) -> "
  559: 	      "true end)">>),
  560:     [{'$1',[{is_integer,'$1'},
  561: 		  {is_float,'$1'},
  562: 		  {is_atom,'$1'},
  563: 		  {is_list,'$1'},
  564: 		  {is_number,'$1'},
  565: 		  {is_pid,'$1'},
  566: 		  {is_port,'$1'},
  567: 		  {is_reference,'$1'},
  568: 		  {is_tuple,'$1'},
  569: 		  {is_binary,'$1'},
  570: 		  {is_record,'$1',a,3}],
  571: 	    [true]}] =
  572: 	compile_and_run(RD, <<
  573: 			     "ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when integer(X),"
  574: 			     "float(X), atom(X),"
  575: 			     "list(X), number(X), pid(X),"
  576: 			     "port(X), reference(X), tuple(X),"
  577: 			     "binary(X), record(X,a) -> true end)"
  578: 			     >>),
  579:     ok.
  580: 
  581: %% Test use of autoimported BIFs used like erlang:'+'(A,B) in guards
  582: %% and body.
  583: autoimported(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  584:     setup(Config),
  585:     Allowed = [
  586: 	       {abs,1},
  587: 	       {element,2},
  588: 	       {hd,1},
  589: 	       {length,1},
  590:                {max,2},
  591:                {min,2},
  592: 	       {node,0},
  593: 	       {node,1},
  594: 	       {round,1},
  595: 	       {size,1},
  596: 	       {tl,1},
  597: 	       {trunc,1},
  598: 	       {self,0},
  599:                %%{float,1}, see float_1_function/1
  600: 	       {is_atom,1},
  601: 	       {is_float,1},
  602: 	       {is_integer,1},
  603: 	       {is_list,1},
  604: 	       {is_number,1},
  605: 	       {is_pid,1},
  606: 	       {is_port,1},
  607: 	       {is_reference,1},
  608: 	       {is_tuple,1},
  609: 	       {is_binary,1},
  610: 	       {is_function,1},
  611: 	       {is_record,2,magic},
  612: 	       {'and',2,infix},
  613: 	       {'or',2,infix},
  614: 	       {'xor',2,infix},
  615: 	       {'not',1},
  616: 	       %%{'andalso',2,infix},
  617: 	       %%{'orelse',2,infix},
  618: 	       {'+',1},
  619: 	       {'+',2,infix},
  620: 	       {'-',1},
  621: 	       {'-',2,infix},
  622: 	       {'*',2,infix},
  623: 	       {'/',2,infix},
  624: 	       {'div',2,infix},
  625: 	       {'rem',2,infix},
  626: 	       {'band',2,infix},
  627: 	       {'bor',2,infix},
  628: 	       {'bxor',2,infix},
  629: 	       {'bnot',1},
  630: 	       {'bsl',2,infix},
  631: 	       {'bsr',2,infix},
  632: 	       {'>',2,infix},
  633: 	       {'>=',2,infix},
  634: 	       {'<',2,infix},
  635: 	       {'=<',2,infix},
  636: 	       {'==',2,infix},
  637: 	       {'=:=',2,infix},
  638: 	       {'/=',2,infix},
  639: 	       {'=/=',2,infix}],
  640:     RD = <<"-record(a,{a,b}).">>,
  641:     lists:foreach(
  642: 	    fun({A,0}) ->
  643: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  644: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  645: 			     [
  646: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  647: 			      L,<<"() -> ">>,
  648: 			      L,<<"() end)">>
  649: 			     ]),
  650: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  651: 			     [
  652: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'">>,
  653: 			      L,<<"'() -> erlang:'">>,
  654: 			      L,<<"'() end)">>
  655: 			     ]),
  656: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  657: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  658: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  659: 			true ->
  660: 			    ok;
  661: 			false ->
  662: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  663: 		    end;
  664: 	    ({A,1}) ->
  665: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  666: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  667: 			     [
  668: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  669: 			      L,<<"(X) -> ">>,
  670: 			      L,<<"(X) end)">>
  671: 			     ]),
  672: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  673: 			     [
  674: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'">>,
  675: 			      L,<<"'(X) -> erlang:'">>,
  676: 			      L,<<"'(X) end)">>
  677: 			     ]),
  678: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  679: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  680: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  681: 			true ->
  682: 			    ok;
  683: 			false ->
  684: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  685: 		    end;
  686: 	    ({A,2}) ->
  687: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  688: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  689: 			     [
  690: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when ">>,
  691: 			      L,<<"(X,Y) -> ">>,
  692: 			      L,<<"(X,Y) end)">>
  693: 			     ]),
  694: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  695: 			     [
  696: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when erlang:'">>,
  697: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) -> erlang:'">>,
  698: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) end)">>
  699: 			     ]),
  700: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  701: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  702: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  703: 			true ->
  704: 			    ok;
  705: 			false ->
  706: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  707: 		    end;
  708: 	    ({A,2,infix}) ->
  709: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  710: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  711: 			     [
  712: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when X ">>,
  713: 			      L,<<" Y -> X ">>,
  714: 			      L,<<" Y end)">>
  715: 			     ]),
  716: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  717: 			     [
  718: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when erlang:'">>,
  719: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) -> erlang:'">>,
  720: 			      L,<<"'(X,Y) end)">>
  721: 			     ]),
  722: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(Bin1),
  723: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(Bin2),
  724: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  725: 			true ->
  726: 			    ok;
  727: 			false ->
  728: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  729: 		    end;
  730: 	    ({A,2,magic}) -> %is_record
  731: 		    L = atom_to_list(A),
  732: 		    Bin1 = list_to_binary(
  733: 			     [
  734: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when ">>,
  735: 			      L,<<"(X,a) -> ">>,
  736: 			      L,<<"(X,a) end)">>
  737: 			     ]),
  738: 		    Bin2 = list_to_binary(
  739: 			     [
  740: 			      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'">>,
  741: 			      L,<<"'(X,a) -> erlang:'">>,
  742: 			      L,<<"'(X,a) end)">>
  743: 			     ]),
  744: 		    Res1 = compile_and_run(RD,Bin1),
  745: 		    Res2 = compile_and_run(RD,Bin2),
  746: 		    case Res1 =:= Res2 of
  747: 			true ->
  748: 			    ok;
  749: 			false ->
  750: 			    exit({not_equal,{Res1,Res2,A}})
  751: 		    end
  752: 	    end,
  753: 	    Allowed),
  754:     ok.
  755: 
  756: %% Test semicolon in guards of match_specs.
  757: semicolon(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  758:     setup(Config),
  759:     Res01 = compile_and_run
  760: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
  761: 		     "is_float(X) -> true end)">>),
  762:     Res02 = compile_and_run
  763: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X) -> true; "
  764: 		     "(X) when is_float(X) -> true end)">>),
  765:     ?assertEqual(Res01, Res02),
  766:     Res11 = compile_and_run
  767: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
  768: 		     "is_float(X); atom(X) -> true end)">>),
  769:     Res12 = compile_and_run
  770: 		   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X) -> true; "
  771: 		     "(X) when is_float(X) -> true; "
  772: 		     "(X) when is_atom(X) -> true end)">>),
  773:     ?assertEqual(Res11, Res12),
  774:     ok.
  775: 
  776: 
  777: %% OTP-5297. The function float/1.
  778: float_1_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  779:     setup(Config),
  780:     RunMS = fun(L, MS) ->
  781:                     ets:match_spec_run(L, ets:match_spec_compile(MS))
  782:             end,
  783:     MS1 = compile_and_run
  784:                   (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) -> float(X) end)">>),
  785:     [F1] = RunMS([3], MS1),
  786:     ?assert(is_float(F1) and (F1 == 3)),
  787: 
  788:     MS1b = compile_and_run
  789:                   (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun(X) -> float(X) end)">>),
  790:     [F2] = RunMS([3], MS1b),
  791:     ?assert(is_float(F2) and (F2 == 3)),
  792: 
  793:     MS2 = compile_and_run
  794:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_pid(X) or float(X) -> true end)">>),
  795:     ?assertEqual([], RunMS([3.0], MS2)),
  796: 
  797:     MS3 = compile_and_run
  798:             (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_pid(X); float(X) -> true end)">>),
  799:     ?assertEqual([true], RunMS([3.0], MS3)),
  800: 
  801:     MS4 = compile_and_run
  802:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:float(X) > 1 -> big;"
  803:                "              (_) -> small end)">>),
  804:     ?assertEqual([small,big], RunMS([1.0, 3.0], MS4)),
  805: 
  806:     MS5 = compile_and_run
  807:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when float(X) > 1 -> big;"
  808:                "              (_) -> small end)">>),
  809:     ?assertEqual([small,big], RunMS([1.0, 3.0], MS5)),
  810: 
  811:     %% This is the test from autoimported/1.
  812:     ?assertEqual([{'$1',[{is_float,'$1'}],[{float,'$1'}]}],
  813:         compile_and_run
  814:             (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when float(X) -> float(X) end)">>)),
  815:     ?assertEqual([{'$1',[{float,'$1'}],[{float,'$1'}]}],
  816:         compile_and_run
  817:            (<<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when erlang:'float'(X) -> "
  818:               "erlang:'float'(X) end)">>)),
  819:     ok.
  820: 
  821: 
  822: %% Test all 'action functions'.
  823: action_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  824:     setup(Config),
  825:     [{['$1','$2'],[],
  826: 	    [{set_seq_token,label,0},
  827: 	     {get_seq_token},
  828: 	     {message,'$1'},
  829: 	     {return_trace},
  830: 	     {exception_trace}]}] =
  831: 	compile_and_run
  832: 	  (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  833: 	    "set_seq_token(label, 0), "
  834: 	    "get_seq_token(), "
  835: 	    "message(X), "
  836: 	    "return_trace(), "
  837: 	    "exception_trace() end)">>),
  838:     [{['$1','$2'],[],
  839: 	    [{process_dump},
  840: 	     {enable_trace,send},
  841: 	     {enable_trace,'$2',send},
  842: 	     {disable_trace,procs},
  843: 	     {disable_trace,'$2',procs}]}] =
  844: 	compile_and_run
  845: 	  (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  846: 	    "process_dump(), "
  847: 	    "enable_trace(send), "
  848: 	    "enable_trace(Y, send), "
  849: 	    "disable_trace(procs), "
  850: 	    "disable_trace(Y, procs) end)">>),
  851:     [{['$1','$2'],
  852: 	    [],
  853: 	    [{display,'$1'},
  854: 	     {caller},
  855: 	     {set_tcw,{const,16}},
  856: 	     {silent,true},
  857: 	     {trace,[send],[procs]},
  858: 	     {trace,'$2',[procs],[send]}]}] =
  859: 	compile_and_run
  860: 	  (<<"A = 16, dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  861: 	    "display(X), "
  862: 	    "caller(), "
  863: 	    "set_tcw(A), "
  864: 	    "silent(true), "
  865: 	    "trace([send], [procs]), "
  866: 	    "trace(Y, [procs], [send])  end)">>),
  867:     [{['$1','$2'],
  868:              [],
  869:              [{caller_line},
  870:               {current_stacktrace},
  871:               {current_stacktrace,3}]}] =
  872:         compile_and_run
  873:           (<<"dbg:fun2ms(fun([X,Y]) -> "
  874:              "caller_line(),"
  875:              "current_stacktrace(),"
  876:              "current_stacktrace(3) end)">>),
  877:     ok.
  878:

  900: otp_16824(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  901:     setup(Config),
  902:     Prog = <<
  903:       "-module(tmp).\n",
  904:       "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
  905:       "-export([tmp/1]).\n\n",
  906:       "tmp(_) -> ets:fun2ms(fun(<<>>) -> 1 end).\n">>,
  907:     FN = temp_name(),
  908:     ok = file:write_file(FN, Prog),
  909:     {ok, Forms} = parse_file(FN),
  910:     {error,[{_, [{{5,25},ms_transform,_}]}], []} =
  911:         compile:forms(Forms, [return]),
  912:     ok.

  914: %% OTP-17186.
  915: unused_record(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  916:     setup(Config),
  917:     Record = <<"-record(r, {f}).\n\n">>,
  918:     Expr = <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(#r{}) -> e end)">>,
  919:     [] = compile_ww(Record, Expr),
  920:     ok.
  921: 
  922: optimise_equality_guards_ets_compilation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  923:     setup(Config),
  924:     ?assertMatch(
  925:        [{{42,'$2'},[],[{{42,'$2'}}]}],
  926:        compile_and_run(
  927:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= 42 -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  928:     ?assertMatch(
  929:        [{{42,'$2'},[],[{{42,'$2'}}]}],
  930:        compile_and_run(
  931:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when 42 =:= K -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  932:     ?assertMatch(
  933:        [{{my_atom,'$2'},[],[{{my_atom,'$2'}}]}],
  934:        compile_and_run(
  935:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= my_atom -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  936:     ?assertMatch(
  937:        [{{[],'$2'},[],[{{[],'$2'}}]}],
  938:        compile_and_run(
  939:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= [] -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  940:     ?assertMatch(
  941:        [{{$z,'$2'},[],[{{$z,'$2'}}]}],
  942:        compile_and_run(
  943:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= $z -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  944:     ?assertMatch(
  945:        [{{"str",'$2'},[],[{{"str",'$2'}}]}],
  946:        compile_and_run(
  947:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= \"str\" -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  948:     ?assertMatch(
  949:        [{{42,my_atom,'$3'},[],[{{42,my_atom,'$3'}}]}],
  950:        compile_and_run(
  951:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>)),
  952:     ?assertMatch(
  953:        [{{{'$1',42},'$3'},[],[{{{{'$1',42}},'$3'}}]}],
  954:        compile_and_run(
  955:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, V}) when K2 =:= 42 -> {{K1,K2},V} end)">>)),
  956:     ?assertMatch(
  957:        [{{#{'$1':=42},'$3'},[],[{{#{'$1':=42},'$3'}}]}],
  958:        compile_and_run(
  959:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({#{A := B}, V}) when B =:= 42 -> {#{A => 42},V} end)">>)),
  960:     ?assertMatch(
  961:        [{{#{a:=42},'$2'},[],[{{#{a:=42},'$2'}}]}],
  962:        compile_and_run(
  963:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({#{a := B}, V}) when B =:= 42 -> {#{a => B},V} end)">>)),
  964:     ?assertMatch(
  965:        [{{#{42:='$2'},'$3'},[],[{{#{42:='$2'},'$3'}}]}],
  966:        compile_and_run(
  967:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({#{A := B}, V}) when A =:= 42 -> {#{42 => B},V} end)">>)),
  968:     ?assertMatch(
  969:        [{{42,'$2'},[{'>', '$2', 10}],[{{42,'$2'}}]}],
  970:        compile_and_run(
  971:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when (V > 10) andalso (K =:= 42) -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  972:     ?assertMatch(
  973:        [{{42,'$2'},[{'>', '$2', 10}],[{{42,'$2'}}]}],
  974:        compile_and_run(
  975:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when (K =:= 42) and (V > 10) -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  976:     ?assertMatch(
  977:        [{{42,7,'$3'},[],[{{42,7,'$3'}}]}],
  978:        compile_and_run(
  979:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V1, V2}) when (V1 =:= 7) andalso (K =:= 42) -> {K,V1,V2} end)">>)),
  980:     ?assertMatch(
  981:        [{{42,7,'$3'},[{'>', '$3', 6}],[{{42,7,'$3'}}]}],
  982:        compile_and_run(
  983:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V1, V2}) when ((V2 > 6) andalso (V1 =:= 7)) andalso (K =:= 42) -> {K,V1,V2} end)">>)),
  984:     ?assertMatch(
  985:        [{{6,'$2'},[],[{{6,'$2'}}]}],
  986:        compile_and_run_decl(
  987:          <<"Needle">>,
  988:          6,
  989:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= Needle -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  990:     ?assertMatch(
  991:        [{{6.0,'$2'},[],[{{6.0,'$2'}}]}],
  992:        compile_and_run_decl(
  993:          <<"Needle">>,
  994:          6.0,
  995:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= Needle -> {K,V} end)">>)),
  996:     ?assertEqual(
  997:        [{ '$1',
  998:           [{'is_integer','$1'}, {'>', '$1', 2}],
  999:           ['$1']
 1000:        }],
 1001:        compile_and_run(
 1002:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X), "
 1003:            "X > 2 -> X end)">>)
 1004:      ),
 1005:     ?assertEqual(
 1006:        [{ 2,
 1007:           [],
 1008:           ['true']}
 1009:        ],
 1010:        compile_and_run(
 1011:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X), "
 1012:            "X =:= 2 -> true end)">>)
 1013:      ),
 1014:     ?assertEqual(
 1015:        [{ '$1',
 1016:              [ {'orelse',
 1017:                  {'is_integer','$1'},
 1018:                  {'is_float','$1'}}],
 1019:              ['$1']},
 1020:         { 5,
 1021:              [],
 1022:              [5]}
 1023:        ],
 1024:        compile_and_run(
 1025:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
 1026:            "is_float(X); X =:= 5 -> X end)">>)
 1027:      ),
 1028:     ?assertEqual(
 1029:        [{ '$1',
 1030:              [{'is_integer','$1'}],
 1031:              ['$1']},
 1032:         { 8,
 1033:              [],
 1034:              [8]},
 1035:         { '$1',
 1036:              [{'is_float','$1'}],
 1037:              ['$1']}
 1038:        ],
 1039:        compile_and_run(
 1040:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X) -> X; "
 1041:            "(X) when 8 =:= X -> X;"

 1043:      ),
 1044:     ?assertMatch(
 1045:        [{{{1,2}},[],[{{1,2}}]}],
 1046:        compile_and_run(
 1047:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (A) when A =:= {1,2} -> A end)">>)),
 1048:     ?assertMatch(
 1049:        [{{{{11,12}},'$2','$3'},[{'>', '$2', 4}],['$3']}],
 1050:        compile_and_run(
 1051:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V1, V2}) when (K =:= {11,12}) andalso (V1 > 4) -> V2 end)">>)),
 1052:     ?assertMatch(
 1053:        [{[1,2,3],[],[[1,2,3]]}],
 1054:        compile_and_run(
 1055:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (A) when A =:= [1,2,3] -> A end)">>)),
 1056:     ?assertMatch(
 1057:        [{{{[1,2,{{foo,bar}}], {{a, 7}}}},[],[{{[1,2,{{foo,bar}}], {{a, 7}}}}]}],

 1059:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (Complex) when Complex =:= {[1,2,{foo,bar}], {a, 7}} -> Complex end)">>)),
 1060:     ?assertMatch(
 1061:        [{1,[false],[1]}],
 1062:        compile_and_run(
 1063:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (A) when A =:= 1, A > 2 -> A end)">>)),
 1064:     ?assertMatch(
 1065:        [{{42,'$2'},[{'>', '$2', 10}],[{{42,'$2'}}]}],
 1066:        compile_and_run(
 1067:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when (K =:= 42) and (V > 10) -> {K,V} end)">>)),
 1068:     ?assertMatch(
 1069:        [{{'$1', '$2'},[false],[{{'$1', '$2'}}]}],
 1070:        compile_and_run(
 1071:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when (K =:= 42) and (K =:= 7) -> {K,V} end)">>)),
 1072:     ?assertMatch(
 1073:        [{{'_','_'},[],['$_']}],
 1074:        compile_and_run(
 1075:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({_, _}=KV) -> KV end)">>)),
 1076:     ?assertMatch(
 1077:        [{{'_',6},[],['$_']}],
 1078:        compile_and_run(
 1079:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (KV={_, V}) when V =:= 6 -> KV end)">>)),
 1080:     ?assertMatch(
 1081:        [{'$1',[{'=/=', '$1', 7}],['$1']}],
 1082:        compile_and_run(
 1083:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (A) when A =/= 7 -> A end)">>)),
 1084:     ?assertMatch(
 1085:        [{{'$1','$2',[{"yes",'_','_'}]},[],['$_']}],
 1086:        compile_and_run(
 1087:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({_A, _B, [{C, _, _}]} = All) when (C =:= \"yes\") -> All end)">>)),
 1088:     ?assertMatch(
 1089:        [{9,[],[11]}],
 1090:        compile_and_run(
 1091:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (A) when A =:= (4 + 5) -> (A + 2) end)">>)),
 1092:     ?assertEqual(
 1093:        [{0,[false],[0]}],
 1094:        compile_and_run(
 1095:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X), "
 1096:          "X =:= 0, "
 1097:          "X > 2 -> X end)">>)
 1098:     ),
 1099:     ?assertEqual(
 1100:        compile_and_run(
 1101:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1102:          "X =:= 0; X =:= 6 -> X end)">>),
 1103:        compile_and_run(
 1104:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1105:          "(X =:= 0) or (X =:= 6) -> X end)">>)
 1106:     ),
 1107:     ?assertEqual(
 1108:        compile_and_run(
 1109:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when X =:= 0 -> X; "
 1110:        "(X) when X =:= 6 -> X end)">>),
 1111:        compile_and_run(
 1112:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1113:          "(X =:= 0) or (X =:= 6) -> X end)">>)
 1114:     ),
 1115:     ?assertEqual(
 1116:        compile_and_run(
 1117:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1118:          "X =:= 0, X =:= 6 -> X end)">>),
 1119:        compile_and_run(
 1120:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1121:          "(X =:= 0) and (X =:= 6) -> X end)">>)
 1122:     ),
 1123:     ?assertEqual(
 1124:        compile_and_run(
 1125:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1126:          "X =:= 0 -> X end)">>),
 1127:        compile_and_run(
 1128:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1129:          "is_integer(X), (X =:= 0) -> X end)">>)
 1130:     ),
 1131:     ?assertEqual(
 1132:        compile_and_run(
 1133:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when X =:= 0 -> X; "
 1134:        "(X) when X =:= 6 -> X;"
 1135:        "(X) when is_integer(X) and (X > 11) -> X end)">>),
 1136:        compile_and_run(
 1137:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when (is_integer(X) and "
 1138:          "(X =:= 0)) or (X =:= 6) or (is_integer(X) and (X > 11)) -> X end)">>)
 1139:     ),
 1140:     ?assertEqual(
 1141:        compile_and_run(
 1142:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when X =:= 0 -> X; "
 1143:        "(X) when X =:= 6 -> X;"
 1144:        "(X) when is_integer(X) and ((X > 11) or (X < -3)) -> X end)">>),
 1145:        compile_and_run(
 1146:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when "
 1147:          "(X =:= 0) or (X =:= 6) or (is_integer(X) and ((X > 11) or (X < -3))) -> X end)">>)
 1148:     ),
 1149:     ?assertMatch(
 1150:        [{{[1,2,3],'$2'},[],['$2']}],
 1151:        compile_and_run(
 1152:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A,B}) when A =:= [1,2,3] -> B end)">>)),
 1153:     ?assertMatch(
 1154:        [{{<<"a string"/utf8>>,'$2'},[],['$2']}],
 1155:        compile_and_run(
 1156:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({Bin, Val}) when Bin =:= <<\"a string\"/utf8>> -> Val end)">>)),
 1157:     ?assertMatch(
 1158:        [{{#{},'$2'},[],['$2']}],
 1159:        compile_and_run(
 1160:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({Map, Val}) when Map =:= #{} -> Val end)">>)),
 1161:     ?assertMatch(
 1162:        [{{#{foo := bar},'$2'},[],['$2']}],
 1163:        compile_and_run(
 1164:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({Map, Val}) when Map =:= #{foo => bar} -> Val end)">>)),
 1165:     ?assertMatch(
 1166:        [{{{'$1','$1'}, '$3'},[],['$3']}],
 1167:        compile_and_run(
 1168:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, V}) when (K1 =:= K2) -> V end)">>)),
 1169:     ?assertMatch(
 1170:        [{{{'$1','$1'}, '$1', '$4'},[],['$4']}],
 1171:        compile_and_run(
 1172:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, K3, V}) when (K1 =:= K2), (K3 =:= K2) -> V end)">>)),
 1173:     ?assertMatch(
 1174:        [{{{'$1','$1'}, '$1', '$3'},[],['$3']}],
 1175:        compile_and_run(
 1176:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, K2, V}) when (K1 =:= K2) -> V end)">>)),
 1177:     ?assertMatch(
 1178:        [{{{'$1','$1'}, '$1', '$3'},[],['$3']}],
 1179:        compile_and_run(
 1180:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, K2, V}) when (K2 =:= K1) -> V end)">>)),
 1181:     ?assertMatch(
 1182:        [{{{'$1','$1'}, '$1', '$4'},[],['$4']}],
 1183:        compile_and_run(
 1184:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, K3, V}) when (K2 =:= K1) andalso (K3 =:= K2) -> V end)">>)),
 1185:     ?assertMatch(
 1186:        [{{{8,8},8, '$4'},[],['$4']}],
 1187:        compile_and_run(
 1188:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, K3, V}) when (K2 =:= K1) andalso (K3 =:= K2) andalso (K2 =:= 8) -> V end)">>)),
 1189:     ?assertMatch(
 1190:        [{{{'$1','$1'}, '$1', '$4'},[],[{{'$1', '$4'}}]}],
 1191:        compile_and_run(
 1192:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({{K1,K2}, K3, V}) when (K2 =:= K1) andalso (K3 =:= K2) -> {K3, V} end)">>)),
 1193:     ?assertMatch(
 1194:        [{{'$1','$1','$1','$1','$5'},[],[{{'$1','$5'}}]}],
 1195:        compile_and_run(
 1196:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K1,K2,K3,K4,V}) when (K2 =:= K1) andalso (K3 =:= K2) andalso (K1 =:= K4) -> {K3, V} end)">>)),
 1197:     ok.

 1199: optimise_equality_guards_ets_execution(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1200:     setup(Config),
 1201:     % We don't just use ets:test_ms/2 here, since we also watch to capture correctness
 1202:     % with respect to more subtle parameters, such as ordered_set vs. set
 1203:     ?assertMatch(
 1204:        [{42,"yep"}],
 1205:        compile_and_execute(
 1206:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when K =:= 42 -> {K,V} end)">>,
 1207:          [ordered_set],
 1208:          [{41,"nope"},{42,"yep"},{43,"no way"}]
 1209:        )
 1210:     ),
 1211:     ?assertMatch(
 1212:        [{42,"yep"}],
 1213:        compile_and_execute(
 1214:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({K, V}) when V =:= \"yep\" -> {K,V} end)">>,
 1215:          [ordered_set],
 1216:          [{41,"nope"},{42,"yep"},{43,"no way"}]
 1217:        )
 1218:     ),
 1219:     ?assertMatch(
 1220:        [{42,my_atom,"yep"}],
 1221:        compile_and_execute(
 1222:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1223:          [set],
 1224:          [ {41,my_atom,"nope"},
 1225:            {42,my_atom,"yep"},
 1226:            {43,your_atom, "no way"},
 1227:            {44,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1228:          ]
 1229:        )
 1230:     ),
 1231:     ?assertMatch(
 1232:        [{42,my_atom,"yep"}],
 1233:        compile_and_execute(
 1234:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1235:          [ordered_set],
 1236:          [ {41,my_atom,"nope"},
 1237:            {42,my_atom,"yep"},
 1238:            {43,your_atom, "no way"},
 1239:            {44,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1240:          ]
 1241:        )
 1242:     ),
 1243:     ?assertMatch(
 1244:        [],
 1245:        compile_and_execute(
 1246:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1247:          [set],
 1248:          [ {41,my_atom,"nope"},
 1249:            {42,your_atom,"yep"},
 1250:            {43,my_atom, "no way"},
 1251:            {44,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1252:          ]
 1253:        )
 1254:     ),
 1255:     ?assertMatch(
 1256:        [],
 1257:        compile_and_execute(
 1258:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1259:          [ordered_set],
 1260:          [ {41,my_atom,"nope"},
 1261:            {42,your_atom,"yep"},
 1262:            {43,my_atom, "no way"},
 1263:            {44,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1264:          ]
 1265:        )
 1266:     ),
 1267:     ?assertMatch(
 1268:        [{42,my_atom,"yep"}],
 1269:        compile_and_execute(
 1270:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1271:          [ordered_set],
 1272:          [ {41,my_atom,"nope"},
 1273:            {42,my_atom,"yep"},
 1274:            {43,your_atom, "no way"},
 1275:            {44,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1276:          ]
 1277:        )
 1278:     ),
 1279:     ?assertMatch(
 1280:        [],
 1281:        compile_and_execute(
 1282:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1283:          [ordered_set],
 1284:          [ {41.0,my_atom,"nope"},
 1285:            {42.0,my_atom,"yep"},
 1286:            {43.0,your_atom, "no way"},
 1287:            {44.0,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1288:          ]
 1289:        )
 1290:     ),
 1291:     ?assertMatch(
 1292:        [],
 1293:        compile_and_execute(
 1294:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1295:          [ordered_set],
 1296:          [ {41.0,my_atom,"nope"},
 1297:            {42.0,my_atom,"yep"},
 1298:            {43.0,your_atom, "no way"},
 1299:            {44.0,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1300:          ]
 1301:        )
 1302:     ),
 1303:     ?assertMatch(
 1304:        [],
 1305:        compile_and_execute(
 1306:          <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when A =:= 42, B =:= my_atom -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1307:          [set],
 1308:          [ {41.0,my_atom,"nope"},
 1309:            {42.0,my_atom,"yep"},
 1310:            {43.0,your_atom, "no way"},
 1311:            {44.0,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1312:          ]
 1313:        )
 1314:     ),
 1315:     ok.
 1316: 
 1317: optimise_equality_guards_ets_equivalence(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1318:     setup(Config),
 1319:     FloatKeySetData =
 1320:        [ {41.0,my_atom,"nope"},
 1321:          {42.0,my_atom,"yep"},
 1322:          {43.0,your_atom, "no way"},
 1323:          {44.0,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1324:        ],
 1325:     IntKeySetData =
 1326:        [ {41,my_atom,"nope"},
 1327:          {42,my_atom,"yep"},
 1328:          {43,your_atom, "no way"},
 1329:          {44,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1330:        ],
 1331:     FloatKeyBagData =
 1332:        [ {41.0,my_atom,"nope"},
 1333:          {42.3,my_atom,"yep"},
 1334:          {42.3,my_atom,"yep"},
 1335:          {42.3,your_atom,"yes"},
 1336:          {43.0,your_atom, "no way"},
 1337:          {44.0,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1338:        ],
 1339:     IntKeyBagData =
 1340:        [ {41,my_atom,"nope"},
 1341:          {42,my_atom,"yep"},
 1342:          {42,my_atom,"yep"},
 1343:          {42,your_atom,"yes"},
 1344:          {43,your_atom, "no way"},
 1345:          {44,"not_an_atom", "definitely not"}
 1346:        ],
 1347:     Compare = fun (SimpleQuery,OptimisedQuery,TableOpts,Data) ->
 1348:         ?assertEqual(
 1349:            compile_and_execute(
 1350:              SimpleQuery,
 1351:              TableOpts,
 1352:              Data
 1353:            ),
 1354:            compile_and_execute(
 1355:              OptimisedQuery,
 1356:              TableOpts,
 1357:              Data
 1358:            )
 1359:         )
 1360:       end,
 1361: 
 1362:     % ordered_set float equality handling
 1363:     Compare(
 1364:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1365:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1366:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1367:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1368:      [ordered_set],
 1369:      IntKeySetData),
 1370:     Compare(
 1371:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1372:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1373:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1374:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1375:      [ordered_set],
 1376:      FloatKeySetData),
 1377:     Compare(
 1378:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1379:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.0},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1380:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1381:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.0) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1382:      [ordered_set],
 1383:      IntKeySetData),
 1384:     Compare(
 1385:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1386:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.0},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1387:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1388:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.0) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1389:      [ordered_set],
 1390:      FloatKeySetData),
 1391: 
 1392:     % set float equality handling
 1393:     Compare(
 1394:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1395:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1396:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1397:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1398:      [set],
 1399:      IntKeySetData),
 1400:     Compare(
 1401:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1402:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1403:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1404:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1405:      [set],
 1406:      FloatKeySetData),
 1407:     Compare(
 1408:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1409:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.0},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1410:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1411:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.0) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1412:      [set],
 1413:      IntKeySetData),
 1414:     Compare(
 1415:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1416:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.0},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1417:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1418:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.0) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1419:      [set],
 1420:      FloatKeySetData),
 1421: 
 1422:     % duplicate_bag float equality handling
 1423:     Compare(
 1424:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1425:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1426:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1427:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1428:      [duplicate_bag],
 1429:      IntKeyBagData),
 1430:     Compare(
 1431:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1432:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1433:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1434:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1435:      [duplicate_bag],
 1436:      FloatKeyBagData),
 1437:     Compare(
 1438:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1439:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.3},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1440:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1441:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.3) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1442:      [duplicate_bag],
 1443:      IntKeyBagData),
 1444:     Compare(
 1445:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1446:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.3},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1447:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1448:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.3) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1449:      [duplicate_bag],
 1450:      FloatKeyBagData),
 1451: 
 1452:     % bag float equality handling
 1453:     Compare(
 1454:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1455:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1456:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1457:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1458:      [bag],
 1459:      IntKeyBagData),
 1460:     Compare(
 1461:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1462:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1463:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1464:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1465:      [bag],
 1466:      FloatKeyBagData),
 1467:     Compare(
 1468:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1469:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.3},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1470:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1471:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.3) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1472:      [bag],
 1473:      IntKeyBagData),
 1474:     Compare(
 1475:      <<"[{{'$1','$2','$3'},
 1476:          [{'andalso',{'=:=','$1',42.3},{'=:=','$2',my_atom}}],
 1477:          [{{'$1','$2','$3'}}]}]">>,
 1478:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun ({A, B, C}) when (A =:= 42.3) andalso (B =:= my_atom) -> {A, B, C} end)">>,
 1479:      [bag],
 1480:      FloatKeyBagData),
 1481: 
 1482:     % handling of clause separators
 1483:     Compare(
 1484:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
 1485:          "is_float(X) -> true end)">>,
 1486:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X) -> true; "
 1487:          "(X) when is_float(X) -> true end)">>,
 1488:        [ordered_set],
 1489:        IntKeyBagData),
 1490:     Compare(
 1491:       <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
 1492:         "is_float(X); atom(X) -> true end)">>,
 1493:       <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X) -> true; "
 1494:         "(X) when is_float(X) -> true; "
 1495:         "(X) when is_atom(X) -> true end)">>,
 1496:        [ordered_set],
 1497:        IntKeyBagData),
 1498:     Compare(
 1499:        <<"[{ {'$1'},
 1500:              [{'is_integer','$1'}],
 1501:              ['$1']},
 1502:            { {'$1'},
 1503:              [{'is_float','$1'}],
 1504:              ['$1']}
 1505:           ]">>,
 1506:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
 1507:          "is_float(X) -> X end)">>,
 1508:        [ordered_set],
 1509:        IntKeyBagData),
 1510:     Compare(
 1511:        <<"[{ '_',
 1512:                [false],
 1513:                ['$_']}
 1514:           ]">>,
 1515:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X), "
 1516:          "X =:= 0, "
 1517:          "X > 2 -> X end)">>,
 1518:        [ordered_set],
 1519:        IntKeyBagData),
 1520:     Compare(
 1521:        <<"[{ '$1',
 1522:                [{'is_integer','$1'}],
 1523:                [{{'$1'}}]},
 1524:            { 0,
 1525:                [],
 1526:                [{{0}}]},
 1527:            { '$1',
 1528:                [{'>', '$1', 2}],
 1529:                ['$1']}
 1530:           ]">>,
 1531:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X); "
 1532:          "X =:= 0; "
 1533:          "X > 2 -> X end)">>,
 1534:        [ordered_set],
 1535:        IntKeyBagData),
 1536:     Compare(
 1537:        <<"[{ '$1',
 1538:                [{'is_integer','$1'}],
 1539:                [{{'$1'}}]},
 1540:            { 2,
 1541:                [],
 1542:                [{{2}}]}
 1543:           ]">>,
 1544:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun(X) when is_integer(X), "
 1545:          "X =:= 2 -> X end)">>,
 1546:        [ordered_set],
 1547:        IntKeyBagData),
 1548: 
 1549:     % The inlined value is itself a compound value
 1550:     Compare(
 1551:      <<"[{ {{41,my_atom,\"nope\"}},
 1552:            [],
 1553:            [{{41,my_atom,\"nope\"}}]
 1554:         }]">>,
 1555:      <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (A) when A =:= {41,my_atom,\"nope\"} -> A end)">>,
 1556:      [ordered_set],
 1557:      IntKeySetData),
 1558: 
 1559:     % A carefully crafted query ends up giving the same results as
 1560:     % a more naively written one
 1561:     Compare(
 1562:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({0,_}) -> 0; "
 1563:        "({6,_}) -> 6; "
 1564:        "({X,42}) when is_integer(X) -> X end)">>,
 1565:        <<"ets:fun2ms(fun({X,Y}) when "
 1566:          "(X =:= 0) orelse (X =:= 6) orelse (is_integer(X) andalso (Y =:= 42)) -> X end)">>,
 1567:        [ordered_set],
 1568:        [ {0,x},
 1569:          {6.0,42},
 1570:          {6,y},
 1571:          {b,42},
 1572:          {1,42},
 1573:          {a,42}
 1574:        ]
 1575:     ),
 1576:     ok.
 1577: 
 1578: ms_transform_optimisations_can_be_disabled_but_default_to_on(Config) ->
 1579:     setup(Config),
 1580:     OptimisableFunctionSrc =
 1581:       <<"ets:fun2ms(fun (X) when X =:= 1 -> X end)">>,
 1582:     OptimisationsOff =
 1583:       compile_and_run_with_opt(OptimisableFunctionSrc, {no_optimise_fun2ms, true}),
 1584:     OptimisationsOn =
 1585:       compile_and_run_with_opt(OptimisableFunctionSrc, {no_optimise_fun2ms, false}),
 1586:     OptimisationsDefault =
 1587:       compile_and_run(OptimisableFunctionSrc),
 1588:     ?assertEqual(
 1589:        [{ '$1',
 1590:           [{'=:=', '$1', 1}],
 1591:           ['$1']}
 1592:        ],
 1593:        OptimisationsOff
 1594:     ),
 1595:     ?assertEqual(
 1596:        [{ 1,
 1597:           [],
 1598:           [1]}
 1599:        ],
 1600:        OptimisationsOn
 1601:     ),
 1602:     ?assertEqual(OptimisationsOn, OptimisationsDefault).
 1603: 
 1604: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1605: %% Helpers
 1606: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1607: 
 1608: setup(Config) ->
 1609:     put(mts_config,Config),
 1610:     put(mts_tf_counter,0).
 1611: 
 1612: temp_name() ->
 1613:     Conf = get(mts_config),
 1614:     C = get(mts_tf_counter),
 1615:     put(mts_tf_counter,C+1),
 1616:     filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Conf),
 1617: 		   "tempfile"++integer_to_list(C)++".tmp"]).
 1618: 
 1619: 
 1620: expect_failure(Recs,Code) ->
 1621:     case (catch compile_and_run(Recs,Code)) of
 1622: 	      {'EXIT',_Foo} ->
 1623: 		  ok;
 1624: 	      Other ->
 1625: 		  exit({expected,failure,got,Other})
 1626: 	  end.
 1627: 
 1628: compile_and_run(Expr) ->
 1629:     compile_and_run(<<>>,Expr).
 1630: compile_and_run(Records,Expr) ->
 1631:     Prog = <<
 1632: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
 1633:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
 1634:     "-export([tmp/0]).\n",
 1635:     Records/binary,"\n",
 1636:     "tmp() ->\n",
 1637:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
 1638:     FN=temp_name(),
 1639:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
 1640:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
 1641:     Bin =
 1642:       case compile:forms(Forms) of
 1643:         {ok,tmp,B} -> B;
 1644:         E ->
 1645:           error(lists:flatten(io_lib:format(
 1646:             "Compilation of match expression failed: ~tp~nForms were:~n~tp~nStacktrace:~tp~n",
 1647:             [E, lists:flatten([erl_pp:form(Form) || Form <- Forms]), (catch error("Stack trace"))])))
 1648:       end,
 1649:     code:load_binary(tmp,FN,Bin),
 1650:     tmp:tmp().
 1651: 
 1652: compile_and_run_with_opt(Expr,Opt) ->
 1653:     compile_and_run_with_opt(<<>>,Expr,Opt).
 1654: compile_and_run_with_opt(Records,Expr,Opt) ->
 1655:     Prog = <<
 1656: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
 1657:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
 1658:     "-export([tmp/0]).\n",
 1659:     Records/binary,"\n",
 1660:     "tmp() ->\n",
 1661:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
 1662:     FN=temp_name(),
 1663:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
 1664:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
 1665:     Bin =
 1666:       case compile:forms(Forms,Opt) of
 1667:         {ok,tmp,B} -> B;
 1668:         E ->
 1669:           error(lists:flatten(io_lib:format(
 1670:             "Compilation of match expression failed: ~tp~nForms were:~n~tp~nStacktrace:~tp~n",
 1671:             [E, lists:flatten([erl_pp:form(Form) || Form <- Forms]), (catch error("Stack trace"))])))
 1672:       end,
 1673:     code:load_binary(tmp,FN,Bin),
 1674:     tmp:tmp().
 1675: 
 1676: compile_and_execute(Expr, TableOpts, TableData) ->
 1677:     compile_and_execute(<<>>,Expr,TableOpts,TableData).
 1678: compile_and_execute(Records,Expr,TableOpts,TableData) ->
 1679:     Prog = <<
 1680: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
 1681:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
 1682:     "-export([tmp/0]).\n",
 1683:     Records/binary,"\n",
 1684:     "tmp() ->\n",
 1685:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
 1686:     FN=temp_name(),
 1687:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
 1688:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
 1689:     {ok,tmp,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms),
 1690:     code:load_binary(tmp,FN,Bin),
 1691:     MatchSpec = tmp:tmp(),
 1692:     T = ets:new(t, TableOpts),
 1693:     try
 1694:       ets:insert(T, TableData),
 1695:       ets:select(T, MatchSpec)
 1696:     catch E ->
 1697:       throw(E)
 1698:     after
 1699:       ets:delete(T)
 1700:     end.
 1701: 
 1702: compile_and_run_decl(ArgName, ArgValue, Body) ->
 1703:     Prog = <<
 1704: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
 1705:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
 1706:     "-export([tmp/1]).\n",
 1707:     "tmp(",ArgName/binary,") ->\n",
 1708:     Body/binary,".\n">>,
 1709:     FN=temp_name(),
 1710:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
 1711:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
 1712:     {ok,tmp,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms),
 1713:     code:load_binary(tmp,FN,Bin),
 1714:     tmp:tmp(ArgValue).
 1715: 
 1716: compile_ww(Expr) ->
 1717:     compile_ww(<<>>,Expr).
 1718: 
 1719: compile_ww(Records,Expr) ->
 1720:     compile_ww(Records,Expr,[]).
 1721: 
 1722: compile_ww(Records,Expr, Opts) ->
 1723:     Prog = <<
 1724: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
 1725:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
 1726:     "-export([tmp/0]).\n",
 1727:     Records/binary,"\n",
 1728:     "-file(?FILE, 0). ",
 1729:     "tmp() ->\n",
 1730:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
 1731:     FN=temp_name(),
 1732:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
 1733:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
 1734:     {ok,tmp,_Bin,Wlist} = compile:forms(Forms,[return_warnings,
 1735: 					       nowarn_unused_vars | Opts]),
 1736:     Wlist.
 1737: 
 1738: compile_no_ww(Expr) ->
 1739:     Prog = <<
 1740: 	"-module(tmp).\n",
 1741:     "-include_lib(\"stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl\").\n",
 1742:     "-export([tmp/1]).\n\n",
 1743:     Expr/binary,".\n">>,
 1744:     FN=temp_name(),
 1745:     file:write_file(FN,Prog),
 1746:     {ok,Forms} = parse_file(FN),
 1747:     {ok,tmp,_Bin,Wlist} = compile:forms(Forms,[return_warnings,
 1748: 					       nowarn_unused_vars]),
 1749:     Wlist.
 1750: 
 1751: parse_file(FN) ->
 1752:     epp:parse_file(FN, [{location, {1,1}}]).
 1753: 
 1754: do_eval(String) ->
 1755:     {done,{ok,T,_},[]} = erl_scan:tokens(
 1756: 			   [],
 1757: 			   String++".\n",1),
 1758:     {ok,Tree} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(T),
 1759:     {value,Res,[]} =  erl_eval:exprs(Tree,[],none,none),
 1760:     Res.
